alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 11 at 2:35PM CDT until June 12 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 3 to 5 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Sheboygan, and Ozaukee counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Deland Park Beach in Sheboygan... Blue Harbor Beach in Sheboygan... North Beach in Port Washington...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
